item.text: Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.

After he <st data-num="3522" class="">fasted</st> <st data-num="5062" class="">40</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5062" class="">40</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">nights</st> he was <st data-num="3983">famished</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3588">The</st> <st data-num="3985" class="">tempter</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">command</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>.”<n id="1" />
But he answered, “It is written, ‘Man does not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.’”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>,<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2476">stand</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4119">highest point</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2411" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st>,

and said to him, “If you are the Son of God, throw yourself down. For it is written, ‘He will command his angels concerning you’ and ‘with their hands they will lift you up, so that you will not strike your foot against a stone.’”
Jesus said to him, “Once again it is written: ‘You are not to put the Lord your God to the test.’”

<st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">a</st> <st data-num="3029" class="">very</st> <st data-num="5308" class="">high</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1166" class="">showed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdoms</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">grandeur</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “I will <st data-num="1325">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="4098" class="">throw</st> yourself to the <st data-num="4098" class="">ground</st> and <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473">me</st>.”
Then Jesus said to him, “Go away, Satan! For it is written: ‘You are to worship the Lord your God and serve only him.’”
Then the devil left him, and angels came and began ministering to his needs.
Now when Jesus heard that John had been imprisoned, he went into Galilee.

While in Galilee, he <st data-num="2641" class="">moved</st> from <st data-num="3478" class="">Nazareth</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2730" class="">make</st> his <st data-num="2730" class="">home</st> <st data-num="1519">in</st> <st data-num="2584" class="">Capernaum</st><n id="2" /> by <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3864" class="">sea</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3725" class="">region</st> of <st data-num="2194" class="">Zebulun</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3508" class="">Naphtali</st>,
so that what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah would be fulfilled:

“Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali,

the way by the sea, beyond the Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles—

the people who sit in darkness have seen a great light,

and on those who sit in the region and shadow of death a light has dawned.”
From that time Jesus began to preach this message: “Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is near!”
As he was walking by the Sea of Galilee he saw two brothers, Simon (called Peter) and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea (for they were fishermen).

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1204">Follow</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="4160">turn</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> into <st data-num="231" class="">fishers</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>!”<n id="1" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> their <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> and <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4260">Going on</st> <st data-num="1564" class="">from there</st> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> son of <st data-num="2199" class="">Zebedee</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="4143">boat</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2199" class="">Zebedee</st>, <st data-num="2675" class="">mending</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
They immediately left the boat and their father and followed him.
Jesus went throughout all of Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing every kind of disease and sickness among the people.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> a <st data-num="189" class="">report</st> about <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="565" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">throughout</st> <st data-num="4947" class="">Syria</st>. People<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2560" class="">suffered</st> with <st data-num="4164" class="">various</st> <st data-num="3554" class="">illnesses</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="931" class="">afflictions</st>, those who had <st data-num="4583">seizures</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytics</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="1139" class="">possessed by demons</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
And large crowds followed him from Galilee, the Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea, and beyond the Jordan River.
